description_html:
We are proud to introduce Botanicals, a new wallcovering collection from celebrated Norwegian creators of ConcreteWall, Art Director Lena Johnsen and Photographer Tom Haga. Both striking and serene, Botanicals captures the beauty of Mother Nature in 700 unbelievable Megapixels. Available in ten dramatic motifs, Botanicals offers infinite possibilities for residential and commercial spaces.

Botanicals is a one-of-a-kind wallcovering collection with the power to transform any space from blasé to extraordinary.

• 700 Megapixel images
• Max 16’ x 45’ without repeat
• 10 exclusive styles
• Zoom and crop for unique look
• Residential or commercial use
• Easy to apply and remove
• Scratch-resistant, light-resistant
• Non-flammable, washable
• Quick lead time

The collection features five different plants, including:

Alocasia
Native to rainforest regions, Alocasia is characterized by giant heart-shaped leaves that are often used as impromptu umbrellas in tropical downpours.

Papaver
Throughout history, Papaver has been widely used for its medicinal purposes. It has been believed to promote sleep, relieve indigestion and ease respiratory ailments.

Helleborus
Defined by its dramatic flowers, the Helleborus has made a name for itself in myths and legends. In Greek Mythology, Helleborus was used to cure the madness of King Midas’ daughters after being cursed by the god Dionysus and on the flip side, is rumored to have been used to poison Alexander the Great.

Nelumbo
Nelumbo, sacred to both Hindus and Buddhists, is an aquatic plant that is also a symbol of wellness. Plus, it’s a source of food! The rhizomes and seeds can be popped and eaten like popcorn.

Eryngium
Eryngium is a symbol of admiration. In addition to their ornamental nature, Eryngium is used as an anti-inflammatory supplement, herb for food and an essential oil. It’s even used as a remedy for scorpion stings.

Botanicals is a one-of-a-kind wallcovering that has the power to transform any space from mundane to extraordinary.
